# Hot Fantasy - Fantasy Sports Team Builder

A fantasy sports team builder that works like Tinder. Users swipe through sports players based on attractiveness to build their fantasy team.

## Project Type
- Frontend: React with TypeScript
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- Database: MongoDB or JSON-based storage
- UI: Tinder-like swipe card interface

## Development Guidelines
- Use React hooks for state management
- Implement swipe gesture detection for card interface
- Store user preferences and swipe history
- Calculate team recommendations based on attractiveness ratings
- Support multiple sports (rugby, football, etc.)
